net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.label: o5e_Parser_parseSubActionStrings
net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.toolTip:
Given an action string, look for patters of mark-down to indicate sub actions. Return an array of objects
identifying the name within the markdown and the related action string.
If the markdown isn't matched, return the original string.

arg (0) = action string with **action1** text1 **action2** text2

Return:
{
"actions": [
{"name": "action1", "desc", "action1"}, ]
}
